content.rendered:
On August 2, 2014, Kevin and I gave a talk about Piklist at WordCamp NYC. While the presentation mostly focused on customizing the WordPress admin, our favorite part was showing examples of what people are building with Piklist:

  • WP Engine built an internal on-boarding system using Piklist to customize the UI.
  • Marcus Eby, a Piklist developer, built a highly customized camp website with tons of forms.
  • BrainPOP, a top education website has nine Post Types and 16 Taxonomies that are all very different. Each with its own set of custom fields.
  • Calfee Design, a Bike Repair and Sales company, is running their entire business with a totally customized Piklist application.

A copy of our presentation is available right now to download. Since it’s built right into Piklist, many of you may have it already. If not, just click on the “Add-ons” menu item in the Piklist menu, and activate the “Piklist Demos”. You now have access to everything we discuss on the video.

Let us know what you think.

Or watch at WordPress.tv.
